ejapaya aandu wirodhi udghoshanayaka eksath jathinge manawa himikam mandalayedi shri lankawa sambandhayen yojanawak sammatha wima gana thama pakshaya kanagatu wana bawa eksath jathika pakshaya kiya sitiyi.rate prajathanthrawadaya ha yahapalanaya sthapitha kala yuthu bawa thaman rajayata penwa dun namuth ee pilibanda thakimak nokala nisa shri lankawata erehiwa yojanawak sammatha keruna bawayi eksath jathika pakshaya pawasanne.ada kolambaa pawathwuna madhya hamuwakadi parlimenthu manthri lakshman kirialla kiya sitiye, jiniwa yojanawa parajaya kirimata wada aanduwata awashya wuye emagin deshapalana wasi laba ganimin mathiwarana jayagrahana laba ganima bawayi.eheth aanduwa labana mathiwarana jayagrahana magin jiniwa yojanawen ratata ella wena ahithakara balapam walakwiya nohaki bawayi manthriwaraya penwa dunne."me wage yojanawak sammatha wima nisa ratata ella wena balapama gana me aanduwa thuttuwak tharam wath ganan ganne naha, mathiwarana dinimen me prashnaya awasan wenne naha, anagatha eksath jathika paksha aanduwak aawath me prashnayata muhuna denna wenawa, api aanduwata udaw karanna sudanam.
